divs: Sighting Detailsat approxametly 9:15 pm my son was leaving the house to go home,he lives in riverside,He got into his car and drove down the street turned the corner heading east on ralston when he saw four orange lights hovering in the north eastern sky.Since he was so close to my house he turned around and came back pounding on the front door.Yelling dad!dad! what are these lights.My wife and I bolted out the front door and looked high above the horizon in the noth east sky and their they were four orange lights hovering.We were yelling so loud my next door neighbor also came out of her house and saw what was happening.The lights seemed to be in a formation that would change to being in a straight line to being paired off in twos.the thing is they made no sound and had no collision lights like regular civilian or military aircraft.As they continued to hang in the sky the were not decending but at times asending Now we live in southern california and we see jet aircraft all the time,so I kept waiting for them to just fly over but never did,they just slowly changed formation at one point lining up all four across,them when they paired up two of the lights seemed to drop somthing we could all see this.after about twelve minutes or so the orang lights just started to dissapear not desending or asending.this event lasted about twelve minutes maybe longer I am positive other people saw this as well.
